item.title: Homepage
item.dc:creator: totaltheme
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row padding_bottom="20px"][vc_column width="1/1"][rev_slider_vc alias="slider_2"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row bg_style="stretch" border_style="solid" center_row="yes" id="home-content" tablet_fullwidth_cols="yes" parallax_speed="0.5" column_spacing="40"][vc_column width="1/3"][vcex_icon_box style="one" icon_color="#51baef" icon_size="28px" heading="Free Updates & Support" heading_type="h2" url_target="_blank" icon="refresh" heading_size="16px" url="http://themeforest.net/item/total-responsive-multipurpose-wordpress-theme/6339019?ref=WPExplorer" url_rel="nofollow" container_left_padding="55px"]No wonderpeople love Total. We provide you not only with a clean and well coded theme but also the support you deserve.[/vcex_icon_box][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vcex_icon_box style="one" icon_color="#51baef" icon_size="28px" heading="Highly Customizable" heading_type="h2" url_target="_blank" icon="cubes" heading_size="16px" url="http://totaltheme.wpengine.com/base/advanced-theme-panel/" url_rel="nofollow" container_left_padding="55px"]Total was developed with child theming in mind, but there are also tons ofbuilt-in optionsfor customizing it.[/vcex_icon_box][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vcex_icon_box style="one" icon_color="#51baef" icon_size="28px" heading="Drag & Drop Page Builder" heading_type="h2" url_target="_blank" icon="bars" url="http://totaltheme.wpengine.com/base/visual-composer/" url_rel="nofollow" container_left_padding="55px"]Total comes with an easy drag and drop editor via the Visual Composer making it easy to setup new sites in no time![/vcex_icon_box][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row center_row="yes" bg_style="stretch" border_style="solid" border_color="#ededed" border_width="1px 0 1px 0" bg_color="#f5f5f5" padding_top="40px" margin_bottom="40px"][vc_column width="1/1" margin_bottom="0px"][vc_column_text]

Top Selling WordPress Theme

Total is our most advanced, best selling and highest rated theme to date. Everything you would expect and more from one of the most popular WordPress related websites out there!

[/vc_column_text][vcex_spacing size="40px"][vcex_button url="http://totaltheme.wpengine.com/base/why-choose-total/" title="Why Choose Total" rel="none" style="flat" align="center" color="blue" size="small" font_size="14px" font_weight="400" target="blank" icon_right="question" icon_right_padding="5px"]Why Choose Total[/vcex_button][vc_single_image image="2900" alignment="center" border_color="grey" img_filter="none"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row center_row="yes" bg_style="stretch" border_style="solid" parallax_speed="0.5" column_spacing="40"][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_single_image image="3695" border_color="grey" img_filter="none" img_link_target="_self" alignment="left"][vcex_spacing size="20px"][vc_column_text]Drag & Drop Builder Easily build and save layouts using a drag & drop page builder. Create unlimited layouts for all your posts and pages, no need to memorize a bunch of shortcodes.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3" style="default" bg_style="stretch" border_style="solid"][vc_single_image image="3696" border_color="grey" img_filter="none" img_link_target="_self" alignment="left"][vcex_spacing size="20px"][vc_column_text]Responsive Design The Total theme is fully responsive no matter how you decide to build your pages. Create layouts that your visitors can enjoy on any device, even on their phones![/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_single_image image="3697" border_color="grey" img_filter="none" img_link_target="_self" alignment="left"][vcex_spacing size="20px"][vc_column_text]50+ Builder Blocks Included are 50+ modules to choose from to insert into your posts/pages so you can create amazing layouts. And more added all the time with updates![/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row bg_style="stretch" parallax_speed="0.5" center_row="yes" column_spacing="40"][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_single_image image="3698" border_color="grey" img_filter="none" img_link_target="_self" alignment="left"][vcex_spacing size="20px"][vc_column_text]Advanced Theme Panel A super intuitive and complete theme panel is included so you can change everything including your site colors, container widths, image cropping sizes and much more![/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_single_image image="3699" border_color="grey" img_filter="none" img_link_target="_self" alignment="left"][vcex_spacing size="20px"][vc_column_text]Custom Post Types The built-in custom post types for portfolios, testimonials and staff make it easy to add & manage content. Just use builder elements to insert them anywhere.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_single_image image="3700" border_color="grey" img_filter="none" img_link_target="_self" alignment="left"][vcex_spacing size="20px"][vc_column_text]Premium Sliders Bundled with this theme are two of the best premium sliders available, LayerSlider & Slider Revolution (a $37 total value for FREE), to create epic sliders for your site.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row center_row="yes" bg_style="stretch" parallax_speed="0.5" column_spacing="40"][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_single_image image="3701" border_color="grey" img_filter="none" img_link_target="_self" alignment="left"][vcex_spacing size="20px"][vc_column_text]WooCommerce Support Built-in support for the WooCommerce plugin allows you to sell products on your site. Everything has been designed & extended to fit perfectly with the theme.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_single_image image="3702" border_color="grey" img_filter="none" img_link_target="_self" alignment="left"][vcex_spacing size="20px"][vc_column_text]SEO Optimized Weve paid close attention to SEO while developing this theme (headings, clean code, speed, etc). Your site must look good, but also rank well on search results.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_single_image image="3703" border_color="grey" img_filter="none" img_link_target="_self" alignment="left"][vcex_spacing size="20px"][vc_column_text]Cross-Browser Compatible With Total you don't have to worry if your site works with a specific browser, we've gone ahead and tested the theme with all major browsers to be sure it looks great![/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row bg_style="stretch" border_style="solid" padding_top="40px" bg_color="#f5f5f5" border_color="#ededed" border_width="1px 0 1px 0" center_row="yes" margin_bottom="40px"][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]

Best Rated Theme

People just can't stop talking about the Total WordPress Theme. Have a look at the reviews from some of the many happy customers.

[/vc_column_text][vcex_spacing size="30px"][vc_column_text]

[font_awesome icon="star" size="24px" margin_right="5px" color="555"][font_awesome icon="star" size="24px" margin_right="5px" color="666"][font_awesome icon="star" size="24px" margin_right="5px" color="777"][font_awesome icon="star" size="24px" margin_right="5px" color="888"][font_awesome icon="star" size="24px" margin_right="5px" color="999"]

[/vc_column_text][vcex_spacing size="70px"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][vcex_icon_box icon="magic" style="two" heading="Design Quality" heading_type="h2"]Amazing theme ! Beautiful design and very easy to use with the visual composer plugin and its add-on. Im very satisfied, just the best wordpress theme Ive used ever.[/vcex_icon_box][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][vcex_icon_box icon="cube" style="two" heading="Feature Availability" heading_type="h2"]This is my favorite theme and I have used 100+ over the years. It is feature rich and support is superb. Plus, the developer is working to improve the theme with regular updates.[/vcex_icon_box][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][vcex_icon_box icon="code" style="two" heading="Code Quality" heading_type="h2"]Ive been working with WordPress since 4 years now, in my whole career Ive never seen a theme well developed in such a manner that follows every guideline mentioned by Google.[/vcex_icon_box][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][vcex_icon_box icon="support" style="two" heading="Customer Support" heading_type="h2"]Awesome theme & support, author is involved in the WordPress community. item.title: Visual Composer
item.dc:creator: totaltheme
item.content:encoded: [vc_row bg_style="stretch" parallax_speed="0.5"][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]With the Visual Composer and Total you really can create any post or page your want. The Visual Composer is one of CodeCanyon's best selling plugins for a reason - it makes building websites easy. You can build any post or page by using the various elements included with the plugin. With Total, we've taken it a step further and added our own custom page building elements to give you even more website building power. Checkout our video and our Visual Composer guide to learn more.[/vc_column_text][vcex_spacing size="50px"][vc_video link="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5RwzrlaMBYA"][vcex_spacing size="30px"][vc_cta_button2 h2="Visual Composer Plugin Included Free" style="rounded" txt_align="left" title="Get Started Today" btn_style="rounded" color="blue" size="lg" position="right" link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fthemeforest.net%2Fitem%2Ftotal-responsive-multipurpose-wordpress-theme%2F6339019%3Fref%3DWPExplorer|title:Total%20WordPress%20theme|target:%20_blank" css_animation="left-to-right"]The Total Theme includes the Visual Composer plugin for free, plus it includes TONS of awesome custom modules created specifically for Total. All with front-end editing support![/vc_cta_button2][/vc_column][/vc_row]

Regarding Pricing Tables

  • Add pricing tables anywhere you want with the Visual Composer
  • Pricing modules can be added into composer rows to create 1,2,3,4 column layouts
  • Define a "Featured" pricing or don't define any at all
  • Alter the colors for any pricing table
  • Add a button with a url or a custom button such as paypal
  • Add icons to the standard buttons
  • Enter your pricing features via a WYSIWYG editor!

RegardingCarousels

  • The theme includes image, staff, portfolio, blog and WooCommerce carousel options
  • You can have as many as you want on a page (but less is always better for loading times)
  • The Carousels will actually render in the Visual Composer front-end editor for easy editing
  • You can choose between default or no-margins style
  • You can enable the title or description for staff, portfolio, blog and WooCommerce carousels
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

Regarding Image Sliders

  • You can have unlimited sliders on any page
  • Add sliders in rows, columns...virtually anywhere!
  • Create sliders with the Visual Composer Extension (exclusive Total slider module)
  • Create gallery sliders with the Visual Composer Extension(exclusive Total slider module)
  • Create sliders with the included LayerSlider plugin- $18 Value for Free!
  • Create sliders with the included Slider Revolution plugin - $19 Value for Free!

Pellentesque habitant morbi tristique rutrum senectus et netus et malesuada fames ac turpis egestas. Nunc odio, leo id imperdiet fermentum, mauris nisi auctor eros, eu suscipit mi ligula ac sapien. Ut laoreet interdum augue, eget suscipit nisi tristique eu. Nullam nec leo ut lorem pretium pellentesque eget at.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2" style="default" bg_style="stretch" padding_left="50px"][vc_column_text]We Have Big Ideas Quisque nec nibh ultrices, dictum orci eget, pretium enim. item.title: Features
item.dc:creator: demoswpex
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row center_row="yes" bg_style="stretch" video_bg_overlay="none" border_style="solid" padding_bottom="45px" bg_color="#f6f6f6" border_color="#e8e8e8" border_width="0px 0px 1px 0px" padding_top="45px"][vc_column width="2/3"][vcex_spacing size="30px"][vc_column_text]

Spend less time coding & more time building

Total comes with the Visual Composer plugin built-in so you can easily create your pages using drag and drop right in your post editor. You don't have to be a web designer to create epic and unique layouts![/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_single_image image="3143" css_animation="right-to-left" img_size="full" alignment="right"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row center_row="yes" bg_style="stretch" video_bg_overlay="none" border_style="solid" padding_bottom="90px" padding_top="70px"][vc_column width="1/3"][vcex_spacing size="20px"][vc_single_image image="3144" css_animation="left-to-right" img_size="full"][/vc_column][vc_column width="2/3"][vc_column_text]

Responsive, Mobile-Friendy Design

These days it is more important then ever to provided your users with a website that they can use not only at home but also on the go. That's why the Total WordPress theme is fully responsive and mobile friend. Resize the browser so you can see the responsiveness in action![/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row center_row="yes" bg_style="stretch" video_bg_overlay="none" border_style="solid" padding_bottom="75px" padding_top="65px" bg_color="#f6f6f6" border_color="#e8e8e8" border_width="1px 0px 1px 0px"][vc_column width="2/3"][vc_column_text]

Powerful Admin Panel

The Total WordPress theme makes use of the new Redux Framework for all of it's theme options. Not only is it a very powerful options panel it's also fast, well coded, translatable and most importantly well supported. Quickly and easily customize various parts of your site such as colors, layout, header, image cropping sizes and sooo much more![/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_single_image image="3146" css_animation="right-to-left" img_size="full"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row center_row="yes" bg_style="stretch" video_bg_overlay="none" border_style="solid" bg_color="#4a97c2" border_color="#e8e8e8" border_width="1px 0px 1px 0px" padding_bottom="75px" style="light" padding_top="70px"][vc_column width="1/2"][vcex_spacing size="7px"][vc_video link="http://vimeo.com/64482230"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text]

Create Your Layout

When it comes to your site you should have control over the layout. The Total WordPress theme includes options for boxed or full-width layouts as well as there are built-in options to control the widths of your content so even though the default content width for the desktop is 980px you can make it whatever you want! There are also built-in options to control the widths of your site at the different responsive sizes.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row center_row="yes" bg_style="stretch" video_bg_overlay="none" border_style="solid" bg_color="#f6f6f6" border_color="#e8e8e8" border_width="1px 0px 1px 0px" padding_bottom="45px" padding_top="45px"][vc_column width="2/3"][vcex_spacing size="30px"][vc_column_text]

Elite Author

When you have the choice why go with a new author? Choose an Elite! We've been selling themes for years and over that time we've learned exactly what it is you are looking for and need for your site, so we provide it! From a strong, well coded framework to great support.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_single_image image="3147" css_animation="right-to-left" img_size="full" alignment="right"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row center_row="yes" bg_style="stretch" video_bg_overlay="none" border_style="solid" padding_bottom="45px" padding_top="50px"][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_single_image image="2883" css_animation="left-to-right" img_size="full"][/vc_column][vc_column width="2/3"][vcex_spacing size="20px"][vc_column_text]

Strong, Well-Coded Framework

We've spent a long time building this theme and making sure every aspect is well coded and clean so if you are a developer you can easily tweak your theme to better suit your needs. All the code is commented out so you know exactly what the PHP is there for (in plain English) and there are various filters and "overwritable" functions making child-theming a dream come true![/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: <iframe src="//player.vimeo.com/video/64482230" width="980" height="551" frameborder="0" title="Visual Composer 3.5: Building Complex Layout in Action" webkitallowfullscreen mozallowfullscreen allowfullscreen></iframe>

<iframe src="//player.vimeo.com/video/64482230" width="500" height="281" frameborder="0" title="Visual Composer 3.5: Building Complex Layout in Action" webkitallowfullscreen mozallowfullscreen allowfullscreen></iframe>

item.title: Sample Page
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:
Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my blog. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)
...or something like this:
The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.
As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.title: Advanced Theme Customizer
item.dc:creator: demoswpex
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]Total uses a custom extended version of the WordPress Theme Customizer to give you lots of easy to use options for your website. Simply navigate to your WordPress Dashboard, and under Appearance click on the Customizeitem. Some of the many options include custom logo upload, header style, custom typography, custom image cropping, built-in social sharing and more. Have a look at the screenshots below to see what else Total can do.[/vc_column_text][vcex_spacing size="30px"][vc_column_text]

Easy To Use Options

[/vc_column_text][vcex_spacing size="10px"][vc_single_image image="3974" img_size="full" border_color="grey" img_link_target="_self" alignment="none" style="vc_box_shadow"][vcex_spacing size="30px"][vc_column_text]

Built-in Color Pickers

[/vc_column_text][vcex_spacing size="10px"][vc_single_image image="3978" img_size="full" border_color="grey" img_link_target="_self" alignment="none" style="vc_box_shadow"][vcex_spacing size="30px"][vc_column_text]

Includes Custom Post Type Styling

[/vc_column_text][vcex_spacing size="10px"][vc_single_image image="3979" img_size="full" border_color="grey" img_link_target="_self" alignment="none" style="vc_box_shadow"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Total has the most advanced theme panel out there

item.title: Advanced Page Settings
item.dc:creator: totaltheme
item.content:encoded: [vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]Total includes great options for each and every page you add to our site. When adding a new page, you'll see a Page Settings module just below the main content and/or Visual Composer section. From here you can individually select options on a per page basis for your page layout, custom sidebar, social sharing, enable/disable the header, enable/disable the footer, add a custom footer callout, add a subheading, includea header slider (just paste in your Layer Slider shortcode into this field) and select a title style. Check it out![/vc_column_text][vcex_spacing size="30px"][vc_single_image image="3980" alignment="center" img_link_large="yes" img_size="full" border_color="grey" img_link_target="_self"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Homepage 14
item.dc:creator: totaltheme
item.content:encoded: [vc_row center_row="yes" bg_style="stretch" video_bg_overlay="none" border_style="solid" margin_top="60px" margin_bottom="60px"][vc_column width="1/3"][vcex_icon_box style="one" icon="arrows" icon_color="#000000" icon_size="24px" heading="Drag & Drop Builder" heading_type="h2" heading_color="#000000" heading_size="18px" heading_weight="400" url_target="_self"]Easily build layouts using a drag and drop page builder. Create unlimited layouts for your posts & pages, no need to memorize shortcodes.[/vcex_icon_box][vcex_spacing size="40px"][vcex_icon_box style="one" icon="cogs" icon_color="#000000" icon_size="24px" heading="Advanced Theme Panel" heading_type="h2" heading_color="#000000" heading_size="18px" heading_weight="400" url_target="_self"]A super intuitive and complete theme panel is included so you can change everything including your site colors, container widths, image cropping sizes and much more![/vcex_icon_box][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vcex_icon_box style="one" icon="laptop" icon_color="#000000" icon_size="24px" heading="Responsive Design" heading_type="h2" heading_color="#000000" heading_size="18px" heading_weight="400" url_target="_self"]The theme is fully responsive no matter how you decide to build your pages. Create layouts that your visitors can enjoy on any device.[/vcex_icon_box][vcex_spacing size="40px"][vcex_icon_box style="one" icon="globe" icon_color="#000000" icon_size="24px" heading="Translation Ready" heading_type="h2" heading_color="#000000" heading_size="18px" heading_weight="400" url_target="_self"]The included .PO and .MO files, translatable theme panel (via WPML) and custom functions make it easy to use Total in your native language and/or multiple languages.[/vcex_icon_box][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vcex_icon_box style="one" icon="star" icon_color="#000000" icon_size="24px" heading="50+ Builder Blocks" heading_type="h2" heading_color="#000000" heading_size="18px" heading_weight="400" url_target="_self"]Included are 50+ modules to choose from to insert into your posts/pages so you can create amazing layouts. And more added all the time with updates![/vcex_icon_box][vcex_spacing size="40px"][vcex_icon_box style="one" icon_color="#000000" icon_size="24px" heading="WooCommerce Support" heading_type="h2" heading_color="#000000" heading_size="18px" heading_weight="400" url_target="_self" icon="shopping-cart"]Built-in support for the WooCommerce plugin will allow you to sell products on your site with ease. Everything has been designed & extended to fit perfectly with the theme.[/vcex_icon_box][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row bg_style="stretch" video_bg_overlay="none" border_style="solid" margin_top="30px"][vc_column width="1/1"][vcex_portfolio_grid term_slug="all" grid_style="no_margins" filter="false" columns="4" posts_per_page="8" img_width="500" img_height="350" img_crop="true" img_filter="none" thumb_link="post" order="DESC" orderby="date" pagination="false" title="false" excerpt="false" read_more="false" excerpt_length="15"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row center_row="yes" bg_style="stretch" video_bg_overlay="none" border_style="solid" margin_top="60px" margin_bottom="60px"][vc_column width="1/3"][vcex_icon_box style="one" icon="search" icon_color="#000000" icon_size="24px" heading="SEO Optimized" heading_type="h2" url_target="_self" heading_size="18px" heading_weight="400"]We've paid close attention to SEO while developing this theme (headings, clean code, speed, etc). Your site must look good, but also rank well on search results.[/vcex_icon_box][vcex_spacing size="40px"][vcex_icon_box style="one" icon_color="#000000" icon_size="24px" heading="Clean Code" heading_type="h2" heading_color="#000000" heading_size="18px" heading_weight="400" url_target="_self" icon="code"]The theme is great for developers as well. The well commented and clean code makes it easy for you to tweak the theme and keeps it optimized and expandable.[/vcex_icon_box][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vcex_icon_box style="one" icon="columns" icon_color="#000000" icon_size="24px" heading="Boxed or Full-Width Layout" heading_type="h2" heading_color="#000000" heading_size="18px" heading_weight="400" url_target="_self"]Quickly switch between boxed or full-width layout for your website design. There is no need to dig into the stylesheet or change the grid system to get the layout you need.[/vcex_icon_box][vcex_spacing size="40px"][vcex_icon_box style="one" icon="css3" icon_color="#000000" icon_size="24px" heading="CSS3 Standards" heading_type="h2" url_target="_self" heading_size="18px" heading_weight="400"]This theme has been coded with the latest CSS3 code. Bringing you the best coding standards as well as some cool new tricks such as element animation on page scroll.[/vcex_icon_box][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vcex_icon_box style="one" icon="picture-o" icon_color="#000000" icon_size="24px" heading="Custom Post Types" heading_type="h2" heading_color="#000000" heading_size="18px" heading_weight="400" url_target="_self"]Built-in custom post types for portfolios, testimonials and staff make it easy to add and manage your content. Simply use the included custom builder blocks to insert them anywhere.[/vcex_icon_box][vcex_spacing size="40px"][vcex_icon_box style="one" icon="html5" icon_color="#000000" icon_size="24px" heading="HTML5 Standards" heading_type="h2" url_target="_self" heading_size="18px" heading_weight="400"]The theme uses HTML5 so the code is up to the latest standards. We've also addedHTML5 markup for WordPress forms, search and comments.[/vcex_icon_box][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row center_row="yes" bg_image="2926" bg_style="stretch" video_bg_overlay="none" border_style="solid" padding_top="60px" padding_bottom="60px" margin_top="40px"][vc_column width="1/3" style="default" bg_color="#f7f7f7" bg_style="stretch" border_style="solid" padding_top="30px" padding_left="30px" padding_right="30px" padding_bottom="30px"][vcex_icon_box style="three" icon_color="#f7f7f7" icon_background="#000000" icon_size="36px" heading="Support Requests" heading_type="h2" url_target="_self" icon="envelope-o"]Proin id tellus nec mauris ultrices sagittis non vitae ipsum. OUR MISSION

We're here to make your job easier. How? By providing you with the best theme possible.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vcex_spacing size="25px"][vcex_button url="http://totaltheme.wpengine.com/base/features/" title="Learn More" style="outline" color="black" size="small" border_radius="3px" target="self" rel="none" align="center"]LEARN MORE[/vcex_button][vc_single_image image="2883" alignment="center" img_size="full"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row center_row="yes" bg_style="stretch" video_bg_overlay="none" border_style="solid" bg_color="#4895c0" padding_top="45px" padding_bottom="40px" style="light"][vc_column width="2/3"][vcex_spacing size="10px"][vc_column_text]

Below is a screenshot example of the options included and you can see on this page how it can be used to create epic backgrounds.[/vc_column_text][vcex_spacing size="20px"][vc_single_image image="3983" img_size="full" border_color="grey" img_link_target="_self" alignment="none"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Why Choose Total?
item.dc:creator: totaltheme
item.content:encoded: [vc_row column_spacing="40"][vc_column width="1/2"][vcex_feature_box style="left-image-right-content" content_width="60%" media_width="40%" heading="Drag & Drop Builder" heading_type="h2" image="3890" img_width="9999" img_height="9999" background="#f7f7f7" padding="20px 20px 20px 20px" border="1px solid #e4e4e4" phone_widths="fullwidth"]Easily build and save layouts using a drag & drop page builder. Create unlimited layouts for all your posts or pages with just a few clicks.[/vcex_feature_box][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vcex_feature_box style="left-image-right-content" content_width="60%" media_width="40%" heading="Responsive Design" heading_type="h2" image="3891" img_width="9999" img_height="9999" background="#f7f7f7" padding="20px 20px 20px 20px" border="1px solid #e4e4e4" phone_widths="fullwidth"]Total is fully responsive no matter how you decide to build your pages. Create layouts that your visitors can enjoy on any device.[/vcex_feature_box][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row column_spacing="40"][vc_column width="1/2"][vcex_feature_box style="left-image-right-content" content_width="60%" media_width="40%" heading="50+ Builder Blocks" heading_type="h2" image="3900" img_width="9999" img_height="9999" background="#f7f7f7" padding="20px 20px 20px 20px" border="1px solid #e4e4e4" phone_widths="fullwidth"]Included are 50+ modules to insert into your posts/pages so you can create amazing layouts. And more added all the time with updates![/vcex_feature_box][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vcex_feature_box style="left-image-right-content" content_width="60%" media_width="40%" heading="Advanced Theme Panel" heading_type="h2" image="3901" img_width="9999" img_height="9999" background="#f7f7f7" padding="20px 20px 20px 20px" border="1px solid #e4e4e4" phone_widths="fullwidth"]An intuitive and complete theme panel is included so you can change everything - colors, container widths, image cropping and more![/vcex_feature_box][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row column_spacing="40"][vc_column width="1/2"][vcex_feature_box style="left-image-right-content" content_width="60%" media_width="40%" heading="Boxed & Full-Width Layouts" heading_type="h2" image="3899" img_width="9999" img_height="9999" background="#f7f7f7" padding="20px 20px 20px 20px" border="1px solid #e4e4e4" phone_widths="fullwidth"]Quickly switch between boxed or full-width layout for your website design. No need to dig into the stylesheet to get the layout you need.[/vcex_feature_box][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vcex_feature_box style="left-image-right-content" content_width="60%" media_width="40%" heading="Custom Post Types" heading_type="h2" image="3902" img_width="9999" img_height="9999" background="#f7f7f7" padding="20px 20px 20px 20px" border="1px solid #e4e4e4" phone_widths="fullwidth"]Custom post types for portfolios, testimonials and staff make it easy to add & manage content. plus you can custom name each type![/vcex_feature_box][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row column_spacing="40"][vc_column width="1/2"][vcex_feature_box style="left-image-right-content" content_width="60%" media_width="40%" heading="Unlimited Theme" heading_type="h2" image="3897" img_width="9999" img_height="9999" background="#f7f7f7" padding="20px 20px 20px 20px" border="1px solid #e4e4e4" phone_widths="fullwidth"]Youll love the endless possibilities with Total. Unlimited portfolios, color options, staff, testimonials, blogs, page layouts and more![/vcex_feature_box][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vcex_feature_box style="left-image-right-content" content_width="60%" media_width="40%" heading="Translation Ready" heading_type="h2" image="3896" img_width="9999" img_height="9999" background="#f7f7f7" padding="20px 20px 20px 20px" border="1px solid #e4e4e4" phone_widths="fullwidth"]The included .PO and .MO files & translatable theme panel make it easy to use Total in your language or multiple languages.[/vcex_feature_box][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row column_spacing="40"][vc_column width="1/2"][vcex_feature_box style="left-image-right-content" content_width="60%" media_width="40%" heading="Lovely Theme Skins" heading_type="h2" image="3905" img_width="9999" img_height="9999" background="#f7f7f7" padding="20px 20px 20px 20px" border="1px solid #e4e4e4" phone_widths="fullwidth"]Need a new style fast? Total comes with theme skins that you can quickly select from the "Appearance" tab to change the look of your website.[/vcex_feature_box][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vcex_feature_box style="left-image-right-content" content_width="60%" media_width="40%" heading="FontAwesome Icons" heading_type="h2" image="3906" img_width="9999" img_height="9999" background="#f7f7f7" padding="20px 20px 20px 20px" border="1px solid #e4e4e4" phone_widths="fullwidth"]Total comes with support for FontAwesome icons, so you can add 470+ infinitely scalable icons to any post or page![/vcex_feature_box][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row column_spacing="40"][vc_column width="1/2"][vcex_feature_box style="left-image-right-content" content_width="60%" media_width="40%" heading="Child Theme Ready" heading_type="h2" image="3893" img_width="9999" img_height="9999" background="#f7f7f7" padding="20px 20px 20px 20px" border="1px solid #e4e4e4" phone_widths="fullwidth"]Weve paid close attention to all the functions used in Total to make sure they can be easily extended via child themes.[/vcex_feature_box][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vcex_feature_box style="left-image-right-content" content_width="60%" media_width="40%" heading="WooCommerce Support" heading_type="h2" image="3898" img_width="9999" img_height="9999" background="#f7f7f7" padding="20px 20px 20px 20px" border="1px solid #e4e4e4" phone_widths="fullwidth"]Built-in WooCommerce support allows you to sell products on your site. This is a great way to make some money with your website.[/vcex_feature_box][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row column_spacing="40"][vc_column width="1/2"][vcex_feature_box style="left-image-right-content" content_width="60%" media_width="40%" heading="CSS3 Standards" heading_type="h2" image="3894" img_width="9999" img_height="9999" background="#f7f7f7" padding="20px 20px 20px 20px" border="1px solid #e4e4e4" phone_widths="fullwidth"]This theme has been coded with the latest CSS3 code. Bringing you the best coding standards as well as some cool new tricks![/vcex_feature_box][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vcex_feature_box style="left-image-right-content" content_width="60%" media_width="40%" heading="SEO Optimized" heading_type="h2" image="3895" img_width="9999" img_height="9999" background="#f7f7f7" padding="20px 20px 20px 20px" border="1px solid #e4e4e4" phone_widths="fullwidth"]We used only semantic valid HTML code and proper heading tags when developing Total. Plus the theme is W3C valid![/vcex_feature_box][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row column_spacing="40"][vc_column width="1/2"][vcex_feature_box style="left-image-right-content" content_width="60%" media_width="40%" heading="Power Elite Author" heading_type="h2" image="3903" img_width="9999" img_height="9999" background="#f7f7f7" padding="20px 20px 20px 20px" border="1px solid #e4e4e4" phone_widths="fullwidth"]Total was created by an Envato Power Elite author, with over $1 million in sales, so you know you're getting a fantastic theme![/vcex_feature_box][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vcex_feature_box style="left-image-right-content" content_width="60%" media_width="40%" heading="You Know & Love Us" heading_type="h2" image="3904" img_width="9999" img_height="9999" background="#f7f7f7" padding="20px 20px 20px 20px" border="1px solid #e4e4e4" phone_widths="fullwidth"]WPExplorer is one of the most trusted names in WordPress. We love WordPress as much as you do, so join our WPE family today![/vcex_feature_box][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Testimonial Slider
item.dc:creator: totaltheme
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vcex_testimonials_slider skin="dark" background_style="stretch" count="3" order="DESC" orderby="date" display_author_name="no" display_author_avatar="yes"][vcex_divider style="solid" icon_color="#000000" icon_size="14px" margin_top="0px" margin_bottom="40px" width="100%" height="1px"][vc_column_text]

Regarding The Testimonial Slider

  • You can have unlimited testimonial sliders
  • Automatically displays testimonials from the custom post type
  • Choose to display recent or random testimonials
  • Display or hide the testimonial avatars
  • Choose testimonials from specific categories
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Toggle Bar
item.dc:creator: totaltheme
item.content:encoded: [vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text]Welcome Say hello to the toggle bar. This is an optional section you can use to display any content you'd like. Simply select a page from the theme panel and the content of the page will display here. You can even use the drag and drop builder to create this! This is a perfect place for your company mission statement, alerts, notices or anything else.[/vc_column_text][vcex_spacing size="30px"][vc_column_text]Get In Touch[/vc_column_text][vcex_spacing size="10px"][vcex_list_item icon="envelope" color="#3b86b0" margin_right="10px" text_align="textleft" url_target="self"]Email: support@total.com[/vcex_list_item][vcex_list_item icon="phone-square" color="#3b86b0" margin_right="10px" text_align="textleft" url_target="self"]Phone: 1-800-Total-Theme[/vcex_list_item][vcex_list_item icon="map-marker" color="#3b86b0" margin_right="10px" text_align="textleft" url_target="self"]Address: Las Vegas, Nevada[/vcex_list_item][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text]Our Location[/vc_column_text][vcex_spacing size="30px"][vc_single_image image="3660" border_color="grey" alignment="none" img_filter="none"][/vc_column][/vc_row]
